Lifelines.io

Historical hubs of XX century. Hackathon Project.

Situation

For ClojureCup 2015 hackathon our team explored the topic of history of XX century and exactly, how and where famous people met, who knew whom or could have a chance to meet. Is there a possibility that Dali was influenced by Lenin ideas? Was Einstein’s path ever crossed with Hemingway’s travels?

Task

In 24 hours design a web app and code frontend part.

Year

2015

Website

lifelines.io

In the future we would love to add the possibility to choose people user is interested in, highlight specific places, where they had a chance to meet, and grow in into a comprehensive biographical timeline of people, who influensed history.

Cyclic
